@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.error.value0.single.notValid: Value can't be 0 or lower, provide a positive number
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.error.value0.ranged.tooHigh: Value can't be higher than upper bound
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.error.value1.ranged.tooLow: Value can't be lower than lower bound
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.error.values.ranged.between.sameValues: Values can't be the same with the selected constraint
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.error.maximum.date.past: The chosen KPI token expiration date is too close, please pick a date that falls after {{minimumDate}}.
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.label.goal.summary.single: The goal will be considered reached if the metric measured at the measurement timestamp
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.info.metric: Pick the kind of DefiLlama-sourced metric you want to track.
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.info.constraint.type: Pick the kind of constraint you want to be applied to the tracked metric you've picked above to determine if your goal was reached or not.
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.info.timestamp: This is the timestamp at which the measurement over the picked metric will be taken and used to finalize the oracle.
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.label.goal.summary.ranged: The goal will be considered reached if the metric measured at the measurement timestamp
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.label.summary.ranged.value.between.detai: Please be aware that the success criteria for achieving your goal do not include the lower and upper bounds.
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.label.summary.ranged.value.notBetween.de: Please be aware that the success criteria for achieving your goal do not include the lower and upper bounds.
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.label.summary.ranged.value.range.details: Please be aware that if the final result is equal to the lower bound, the goal is considered to be failed. If it's greater than the lower bound the goal is considered to be linearly reached up to a final value greater than or equal to the upper bound of the range.
@carrot-kpi/defillama-oracle-template.metric.summary.tvl:
The total value locked in {{protocol}} on date {{measurementTime}}.

The current total value locked is {{currentTvl}}.
